jobContext:
Maintenance Leadership: Lead and manage a team of maintenance technicians and engineers, providing guidance, training, and support to ensure high-quality maintenance work.
Equipment Maintenance: Develop and implement maintenance schedules, strategies, and procedures for all mechanical equipment used in the spinning process.
Troubleshooting: Quickly diagnose and resolve mechanical issues to minimize production downtime and ensure optimal equipment performance.
Preventive Maintenance: Establish and manage a preventive maintenance program to reduce the risk of equipment breakdowns and extend the lifespan of machinery.
Budget Management: Develop and manage the maintenance department budget, ensuring cost-effective operations while maintaining equipment reliability.
Safety Compliance: Ensure that all maintenance activities are carried out in compliance with safety regulations and best practices to create a safe working environment.
Documentation: Maintain accurate records of maintenance activities, equipment performance, and spare parts inventory.
Vendor Relations: Collaborate with suppliers and vendors to source spare parts, equipment, and services as needed.
Continuous Improvement: Identify opportunities for process improvement, cost reduction, and efficiency enhancement within the maintenance department.
Reporting: Provide regular reports and updates on equipment status, maintenance activities, and department performance to senior management.
jobDescription: Maintenance Leadership: Lead and manage a team of maintenance technicians and engineers, providing guidance, training, and support to ensure high-quality maintenance work.
educationalReq: A Bachelor's degree (B.Sc) in Mechanical Engineering from a reputable public university.

Responsible for Tender Marketing and monitoring the bid management in order to ensure it is aligned with the organization's requirements and Coordination of tender reviews and deadlines and adjust them to the frameworks given by the clients (Government Electric utilities such as BREB, BPDB, NESCO, DESCO etc.)
Responsible of checking various Tender Search systems daily on online & newspaper and identify to bid purposes and maintain all the Tender purchase issue and maintaining all the upcoming tender list in excel sheet and collecting the APP on daily basis.
Responsible for Prepare and maintain all the Tender and e-Tender related Paper for Tender Submission in Government Electric Utilities( BREB,PDB,DESCO,NESCO etc) and review of information about demands and derivation of supply and follow up the relevant procedures for Tender compilation, authorization and dispatch.
Responsible for Prepare and maintain all the Tender related Paper with specific Document after tender execution. (NOA Acceptance, PG & Contract Agreement, Inspection Call & report Preparation, Bid Validity & Security Extension) and Connect with logistics team to update Dispatch order & track Vehicle Information.
Responsible for maintaining and follow up all the RR, Challan after goods delivery of the Tender effectively and efficiently for billing purposes and ensure timely receivable collection.
Responsible for maintaining overview of all running Tender (Which includes Tender Present Condition such as TEC, Sample Test, Board Meeting & Ministry Approval & undelivered goods ) and communicate with assigned people through email, mobile for all tender status.
Responsible for maintaining and collecting all the results according to Tender Pkg. & Sub-Packages with specific goods in separate excel sheet.
Responsible for Liaison/communication with the officials of the different organization and foreign Companies for execution of assigned job and develop and research new products as per the need of the market and Identify market opportunities & forecast business ventures.
Must have the mentality to visit all the Government Electric Utilities on regular basis.

educationalReq: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in EEE, CSE, ECE, ME in any discipline
